docs.title: Home

docs.text: All of the ComputePod projects based on Python use the mkdocs documentation generation tool. To install mkdocs type: pipx install mkdocs Plugins To help manage the automatic creation of mkdocs pages we use the Awesome Pages To install this plugin type: pipx runpip mkdocs install mkdocs-awesome-pages-plugin We use the mkdocs Material theme To install this theme type: pipx runpip mkdocs install mkdocs-material Finally, to document the python source code we use the mkdocstrings To install this plugin type: pipx runpip mkdocs install mkdocstrings Configuration We use the following mkdocs.yml configuration: site_name: <<the side name>> plugins: - search - awesome-pages - mkdocstrings theme: name: material nav: - ...
